summary: This is a calendar entry scheduling the jury trial for Ghislaine Maxwell, set to begin on November 29, 2021, and end on December 24, 2021. The entry was created and modified on May 11, 2021, and indicates the trial will be presided over by Judge Nathan.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the scheduled jury trial, as indicated by the event title 'Maxwell Jury Trial'.

persons.name: Judge Nathan
persons.context: The organizer/location field for the calendar event is listed as 'Judge Nathan', indicating he is presiding over the trial.

connections.description: Judge Nathan is scheduled to preside over the jury trial of Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Maxwell Jury Trial Start

events.title: Maxwell Jury Trial End
events.description: The scheduled end date for the jury trial of Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's jury trial was officially scheduled to run from November 29, 2021, to December 24, 2021.
The trial was set to be presided over by Judge Nathan.
The scheduling calendar entry was created on May 11, 2021, indicating advanced planning for the high-profile trial.
